allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: remove duplicate nginx directives causing deployment error

Remove global-level directives (access_log, error_log, keepalive_timeout, 
client_max_body_size, types_hash_max_size, client_body_buffer_size) from 
nginx.conf that were conflicting with nginx:1.27-alpine base image defaults.

The docker logs showed:
[emerg] "keepalive_timeout" directive is duplicate in /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf:12

These directives are already configured in the base image with appropriate defaults,
keeping only the server {} block eliminates the conflict and allows the container
to start successfully.

EOF
)")
